Class KmlViewerOptions

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      com.nitrous.gwt.earth.client.api.GESchemaObject
          com.nitrous.gwt.earth.client.api.GEEventEmitter
              com.nitrous.gwt.earth.client.api.KmlObject
                  com.nitrous.gwt.earth.client.api.KmlViewerOptions

public class KmlViewerOptions
extends KmlObject

This class controls the display of sunlight, historical imagery, and Street View panoramas in the plugin. The KmlViewerOptions object is passed to KmlAbstractView.setViewerOptions()

Author:
Nick
